channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational Publishing Engine
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational Publishing Engine

item.title: CVE-2018-1951|2024-08-05T04:14:39.653Z -- ibm -- rational%20publishing%20engine
item.description: IBM Publishing Engine 2.1.2, 6.0.5, and 6.0.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 153494.

item.title: CVE-2018-1533|2024-08-05T04:07:43.448Z -- ibm -- rational%20publishing%20engine
item.description: IBM Rational Publishing Engine 6.0.5 and 6.0.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 142431.

item.title: CVE-2017-1787|2024-08-05T13:39:32.319Z -- ibm -- rational%20publishing%20engine
item.description: IBM Publishing Engine 2.1.2 and 6.0.5 contains an undisclosed vulnerability that could allow a local user with administrative privileges to obtain hard coded user credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 137022.
